content:
I saw that wasi:logging/logging was bumped from the 0.2 release? Is there a WIP anyone uses or does it make sense that I made a weak tiny adapter using the https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-logging wit?

GitHub - WebAssembly/wasi-logging: WASI logging API
WASI logging API. Contribute to WebAssembly/wasi-logging development by creating an account on GitHub.
Oh I see stout/err is wired up with the io polyfill so I guess I just use a standard env loggerâ€¦
